quote: Forgetting is like a wound. The wound may heal, but it has already left a scar.
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: Fear is not evil. It tells you what your weakness is. And once you know your weakness, you can become stronger as well as kinder.
author: Gildarts Clive

quote: A lesson without pain is meaningless. That’s because you can’t gain something without sacrificing something else in return.
author: Edward Elric

quote: The world isn’t perfect. But it’s there for us, trying the best it can. That’s what makes it so damn beautiful.
author: Roy Mustang

quote: Power comes in response to a need, not a desire. You have to create that need.
author: Goku

quote: In our society, letting others find out that you're a nice person is a very risky move. It's extremely likely that someone would take advantage of that.
author: Hitagi Senjougahara

quote: If you don’t take risks, you can’t create a future!
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: The world isn’t beautiful, therefore it is.
author: Kino

quote: A person becomes strong when they have someone they want to protect.
author: Haku

quote: For the world’s sake, I’ll become the hero of justice.
author: Shirou Emiya

quote: People’s lives don’t end when they die, it ends when they lose faith.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: I am not the protagonist of a novel or anything... I am a college student who likes reading, like you could find anywhere. But... if, for argument’s sake, you were to write a story with me in the lead role, it would certainly be... a tragedy.
author: Ken Kaneki

quote: A lesson learned with blood is never be forgotten.
author: Sabaku no Gaara

quote: To know sorrow is not terrifying. What is terrifying is to know you can’t go back to happiness you could have.
author: Matsumoto Rangiku

quote: Forgetting is like a wound. The wound may heal, but it has already left a scar.
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: When you give up, that’s when the game is over.
author: Misaki Ayuzawa

quote: Whether a fish lives in a clear stream or a water ditch, so long as it continues swimming forward, it will grow up beautifully.
author: Koro-sensei

quote: Fear is freedom! Subjugation is liberation! Contradiction is truth! Those are the facts of this world! And you will all surrender to them, you pigs in human clothing!
author: Satsuki Kiryuuin

quote: You should enjoy the little detours. To the fullest. Because that's where you'll find the things more important than what you want.
author: Ging Freecss

quote: Fear cuts deeper than swords.
author: Arya Stark

quote: Power comes in response to a need, not a desire. You have to create that need.

quote: When a man learns to love, he must bear the risk of hatred.
author: Madara Uchiha

quote: We don’t have to know what tomorrow holds! That’s why we can live for everything we’re worth today!
